content: I don't understand why we just don't legalize all these drugs and tax the heck out of it? We could pay off China within the first year if we did, maybe in two years. The only way we in this country will slow down the use of illegal drugs is if we pass a new law that will allow us to give the death penalty for first time users and dealers. The death penalty should be public beheading. Also anyone turning in someone for using these illegal drugs that leads to their arrest would get a check for $2000.00 from the Obama administration.

You know we have tons of old ordnance dating back to WW2 that needs to be disposed of. 105's, 8 inch, 16 inch from the old battlewagons, davey crockett rounds, you get the idea. National Guard units from all 50 states would get excellent live fire experience. Bomb it 24-7. Any Mexican that makes it through the gaunlent and lives, instant citizenship. Of course, that's if we're running low on M-16 ammunition.

content: azmax, If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. I do like the idea of a dead zone, say 3 mile deep area. motion scencers ect. Just need to find a way to keep enough people there to catch the drug runners. Years ago we used the drones with cameras on them to watch the drug runners. All we need to do is fit them with guns and none our people would get hurt during a shoot out. The military has a bunch that will not be in use when the war slows down and more troops come home. Time for someone to step up to the plate and do something about the drug runners that will make a difference.

content: quote: Originally posted by mainedawg: azmax, If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. Time for someone to step up to the plate and do something about the drug runners that will make a difference. If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. Sound very cynical, but maybe we NEED to go through a whole slug of that here to get this country back to basics. This country is fat, stupid and lazy. Ya don't make good steel or fine gold by turning off the fire and letting all the materials sit in a poorly mixed, gross and muddled state. You turn the fire up to 3000 degrees and melt it all together. The useless dross burns off or becomes slag which is poured off and dumped...leaving the beautiful, clean and stronger purified metal behind.... That was done to America by the Revolution, the War of 1812, the Civil War, WWI and WWII - nothing has done it since - - Maybe we are due - - Wandering and Wondering

content: I don't understand why we just don't legalize all these drugs and tax the heck out of it? We could pay off China within the first year if we did, maybe in two years. The only way we in this country will slow down the use of illegal drugs is if we pass a new law that will allow us to give the death penalty for first time users and dealers. The death penalty should be public beheading. Also anyone turning in someone for using these illegal drugs that leads to their arrest would get a check for $2000.00 from the Obama administration.

content: quote: Originally posted by greywolfghost: Fire for effect, boys! Fire for EFFECT!! I like the idea of just condemning a 2 to 5 mile stretch along the border, Texas to California. Turn it into a 1 huge bombing range. You know we have tons of old ordnance dating back to WW2 that needs to be disposed of. 105's, 8 inch, 16 inch from the old battlewagons, davey crockett rounds, you get the idea. National Guard units from all 50 states would get excellent live fire experience. Bomb it 24-7. Any Mexican that makes it through the gaunlent and lives, instant citizenship. Of course, that's if we're running low on M-16 ammunition.

title: Mexico drug cartels have 100,000 armed members.

content: azmax, If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. I do like the idea of a dead zone, say 3 mile deep area. motion scencers ect. Just need to find a way to keep enough people there to catch the drug runners. Years ago we used the drones with cameras on them to watch the drug runners. All we need to do is fit them with guns and none our people would get hurt during a shoot out. The military has a bunch that will not be in use when the war slows down and more troops come home. Time for someone to step up to the plate and do something about the drug runners that will make a difference.

content: quote: Originally posted by mainedawg: azmax, If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. The military has a bunch that will not be in use when the war slows down and more troops come home. Time for someone to step up to the plate and do something about the drug runners that will make a difference. If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. Sound very cynical, but maybe we NEED to go through a whole slug of that here to get this country back to basics. This country is fat, stupid and lazy. Ya don't make good steel or fine gold by turning off the fire and letting all the materials sit in a poorly mixed, gross and muddled state. You turn the fire up to 3000 degrees and melt it all together. The useless dross burns off or becomes slag which is poured off and dumped...leaving the beautiful, clean and stronger purified metal behind.... That was done to America by the Revolution, the War of 1812, the Civil War, WWI and WWII - nothing has done it since - - Maybe we are due - - Wandering and Wondering

content: I don't understand why we just don't legalize all these drugs and tax the heck out of it? We could pay off China within the first year if we did, maybe in two years. The only way we in this country will slow down the use of illegal drugs is if we pass a new law that will allow us to give the death penalty for first time users and dealers. The death penalty should be public beheading. Also anyone turning in someone for using these illegal drugs that leads to their arrest would get a check for $2000.00 from the Obama administration.

content: quote: Originally posted by greywolfghost: Fire for effect, boys! Fire for EFFECT!! I like the idea of just condemning a 2 to 5 mile stretch along the border, Texas to California. Turn it into a 1 huge bombing range. You know we have tons of old ordnance dating back to WW2 that needs to be disposed of. 105's, 8 inch, 16 inch from the old battlewagons, davey crockett rounds, you get the idea. National Guard units from all 50 states would get excellent live fire experience. Bomb it 24-7. Any Mexican that makes it through the gaunlent and lives, instant citizenship. Of course, that's if we're running low on M-16 ammunition.

content: azmax, If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. I do like the idea of a dead zone, say 3 mile deep area. motion scencers ect. Just need to find a way to keep enough people there to catch the drug runners. Years ago we used the drones with cameras on them to watch the drug runners. All we need to do is fit them with guns and none our people would get hurt during a shoot out. The military has a bunch that will not be in use when the war slows down and more troops come home. Time for someone to step up to the plate and do something about the drug runners that will make a difference.

content: quote: Originally posted by mainedawg: azmax, If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. Years ago we used the drones with cameras on them to watch the drug runners. All we need to do is fit them with guns and none our people would get hurt during a shoot out. The military has a bunch that will not be in use when the war slows down and more troops come home. Time for someone to step up to the plate and do something about the drug runners that will make a difference. If we did that we would have IED's all over the place here in the USA. Sound very cynical, but maybe we NEED to go through a whole slug of that here to get this country back to basics. This country is fat, stupid and lazy. Ya don't make good steel or fine gold by turning off the fire and letting all the materials sit in a poorly mixed, gross and muddled state. You turn the fire up to 3000 degrees and melt it all together. The useless dross burns off or becomes slag which is poured off and dumped...leaving the beautiful, clean and stronger purified metal behind.... That was done to America by the Revolution, the War of 1812, the Civil War, WWI and WWII - nothing has done it since - - Maybe we are due - - Wandering and Wondering
